Posts.Title: Has anyone here been diagnosed w/ cancer while on Tamoxifin? SMV SMV

Posts.Content: SMV wrote: Good morning, I was diagnosed with atypical Lobular Hypersplasia through a core biopsy in early February. Yesterday (02/25/15) I was diagnosed with LCIS through the follow up extensional biopsy. They want to place me on Tamoxifen. Here's my question...Has anyone here been diagnosed with cancer while taking Tamoxifen? Dx 2/25/2015, LCIS, ER+/PR+ Hormonal Therapy 3/15/2015 Tamoxifen pills (Nolvadex, Apo-Tamox, Tamofen, Tamone) Hormonal Therapy 3/16/2015 Log in to post a reply

Posts.Title: Has anyone here been diagnosed w/ cancer while on Tamoxifin? SMV SMV
Had a mammo,mag.mammo. U/S and now called in for Targeted U/S SMV SMV

Posts.Content: SMV wrote: I am 41. Went for a mammogram. left craniocaudal spot compression magnification, left 90 degree lateral and left 90 degree lateral spot compression magnification. ACR Birads density Cat C multiple similar amorphous or indistinct, layering and punctuate calcification's with grouped distribution seen in left breast. Calcification's in left breast are probably b9. Birads Cat 3 Was then sent for a magnified mammo . And then called back again for an ultrasound. I do have a cyst. Looks round and clear on screen (from what I can tell) but does not go away when my menstrual cycle ends. Now I was called back for a "targeted" ultrasound. I thought the ultrasound was supposed to show what they needed to see? The targeted U/S is for "outer quadrant on left breast a 3'oclock", the same spot as the cyst. Should I not worry because I am a Birads 3? Dx 2/25/2015, LCIS, ER+/PR+ Hormonal Therapy 3/15/2015 Tamoxifen pills (Nolvadex, Apo-Tamox, Tamofen, Tamone) Hormonal Therapy 3/16/2015 Log in to post a reply
